property.name: username
property.description: If set, the user name to use, and none is set on the deployed sql.ExecutedSqlScripts

property.name: password
property.description: If set, the password to use, and none is set on the deployed sql.ExecutedSqlScripts

property.name: additionalOptions
property.description: Specify additional options to be passed to the command-line SQL client

property.name: sybHome
property.description: The Sybase Home directory that contains the ISQL installation

property.name: dbName
property.description: The Sybase DB to connect to

property.name: address
property.description: The database Hostname or IP address

property.name: port
property.description: The TCP/IP Port to connect to
